languages.text: {n}Содрогнувшись, священник бормочет, скорее себе, чем вам:{/n} "Кощунство. Ересь. Но... Разве есть у меня выбор? Выходит, что от неправедной гибели может спасти лишь неправедная жизнь? Я есмь сосуд греха. А коли так, то что толку в искуплении?"

{n}The priest shudders and mumbles, more to himself than to you,{/n} "Blasphemy. Heresy. And yet... do I have a choice? Is an unrighteous life the only thing that can save me from an unrighteous death? I am a vessel of depravity. And if so, what is even the point of redemption?"
languages.original_text: {n}Содрогнувшись, священник бормочет, скорее себе, чем вам:{/n} "Кощунство. Ересь. Но... Разве есть у меня выбор? Выходит, что от неправедной гибели может спасти лишь неправедная жизнь? Я есмь сосуд греха. А коли так, то что толку в искуплении?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The priest shudders and mumbles, more to himself than to you,{/n} "Blasphemy. Heresy. And yet... do I have a choice? Is an unrighteous life really the only thing that can save me from an unrighteous death? I am a vessel of sin. And if so, what is even the point of redemption?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: {n}The priest shudders and mumbles, more to himself than to you,{/n} "Blasphemy. Heresy. And yet... do I have a choice? Is an unrighteous life the only thing that can save me from an unrighteous death? I am a vessel of depravity. And if so, what is even the point of redemption?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}牧师颤抖着，喃喃自语，更像是对他自己开口一样。{/n}“亵渎之举，异端邪说，可……我还有别的选择吗？莫非只有邪恶的生命，才能将我从不义的死亡中解脱出来吗？我是罪恶的容器，如果真是这样，那救赎还有什么意义？”
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders and mumbles, more to himself than to you,{/n} "Blasphemy. Heresy. And yet... do I have a choice? Is an unrighteous life the only thing that can save me from an unrighteous death? I am a vessel of depravity. And if so, what is even the point of redemption?"

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师颤抖着，喃喃自语，更像是对他自己开口一样。{/n}“亵渎之举，异端邪说，可……我还有别的选择吗？莫非只有邪恶的生命，才能将我从不义的死亡中解脱出来吗？我是罪恶的容器，如果真是这样，那救赎还有什么意义？”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}神父は身震いし、あなたにではなく、独り言でブツブツと呟く。{/n}「冒涜。異端。それなのに…私に選択肢はないだろう？不当な死から私を救えるものは、不当な生だけなのか？私は堕落の器だ。それならば、贖罪をする意味が何処にあるというのだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders and mumbles, more to himself than to you,{/n} "Blasphemy. Heresy. And yet... do I have a choice? Is an unrighteous life the only thing that can save me from an unrighteous death? I am a vessel of depravity. And if so, what is even the point of redemption?"

traits.locale_text: {n}神父は身震いし、あなたにではなく、独り言でブツブツと呟く。{/n}「冒涜。異端。それなのに…私に選択肢はないだろう？不当な死から私を救えるものは、不当な生だけなのか？私は罪の器だ。それならば、贖罪をする意味が何処にあるというのだ？」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}El sacerdote se estremece y murmura prácticamente para sí mismo:{/n} «Blasfemia. Herejía. Y sin embargo... ¿tengo elección? ¿Es una vida injusta lo único que puede salvarme de una muerte injusta? Estoy corrompido por la depravación. Y si es así, ¿qué sentido tiene la redención?».
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders and mumbles, more to himself than to you,{/n} "Blasphemy. Heresy. And yet... do I have a choice? Is an unrighteous life the only thing that can save me from an unrighteous death? I am a vessel of depravity. And if so, what is even the point of redemption?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El sacerdote se estremece y murmura prácticamente para sí mismo:{/n} «Blasfemia. Herejía. Y sin embargo... ¿tengo elección? ¿Es una vida injusta lo único que puede salvarme de una muerte injusta? Estoy corrompido por la transgresión. Y si es así, ¿qué sentido tiene la redención?».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Der Priester schaudert und murmelt mehr zu sich selbst:{/n} "Blasphemie. Ketzerei. Und doch ... habe ich eine Wahl? Ist ein unrechtschaffenes Leben das Einzige, was mich vor einem unrechtschaffenen Tod bewahren kann? Ich bin Instrument der Verkommenheit. Und wenn dem so ist, welchen Zweck hat die Erlösung dann überhaupt?"
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders and mumbles, more to himself than to you,{/n} "Blasphemy. Heresy. And yet... do I have a choice? Is an unrighteous life the only thing that can save me from an unrighteous death? I am a vessel of depravity. And if so, what is even the point of redemption?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Priester schaudert und murmelt mehr zu sich selbst:{/n} "Blasphemie. Ketzerei. Und doch ... habe ich eine Wahl? Ist ein unrechtschaffenes Leben das Einzige, was mich vor einem unrechtschaffenen Tod bewahren kann? Ich bin Instrument der Sünde. Und wenn dem so ist, welchen Zweck hat die Erlösung dann überhaupt?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Le prêtre frémit et se met à marmonner, plus pour lui que pour vous :{/n} « Blasphème. Hérésie. Mais... ai-je le choix ? Serait-il possible que la seule chose qui puisse me sauver d'une mort injuste... soit une vie impie ? Je suis un dépravé. Dans ce cas, pourquoi chercher la rédemption ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders and mumbles, more to himself than to you,{/n} "Blasphemy. Heresy. And yet... do I have a choice? Is an unrighteous life the only thing that can save me from an unrighteous death? I am a vessel of depravity. And if so, what is even the point of redemption?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prêtre frémit et se met à marmonner, plus pour lui que pour vous :{/n} « Blasphème. Hérésie. Mais... ai-je le choix ? Serait-il possible que la seule chose qui puisse me sauver d'une mort injuste... soit une vie impie ? Je suis un transgresseur. Dans ce cas, pourquoi chercher la rédemption ? »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Tüyleri ürperen rahip, gevelemeye başlıyor. Sana hitaben değil de daha çok kendi kendi konuşuyor.{/n} "Dine aykırılık. Kâfirlik. Ancak... Başka seçeneğim var mı? Beni günahkârca ölmekten kurtarabilecek tek şey, günahkâr bir yaşam mı? Ben bir ahlaksızlık yumağıyım. Hâl böyleyken affedilmenin ne anlamı var ki?"
languages.original_text: {n}The priest shudders and mumbles, more to himself than to you,{/n} "Blasphemy. Heresy. And yet... do I have a choice? Is an unrighteous life the only thing that can save me from an unrighteous death? I am a vessel of depravity. And if so, what is even the point of redemption?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tüyleri ürperen rahip gevelemeye başlıyor. Sana hitaben değil de, daha çok kendi kendine.{/n} "Dinsizlik. Kâfirlik. Ancak... Başka seçeneğim var mı? Beni günahkâr bir şekilde ölmekten kurtarabilecek tek şey günahkâr bir yaşam mı? Ben bir ahlaksızlık yumağıyım. Ve eğer öyleyse, affedilmenin ne anlamı var ki?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
